text: Hanki Solomoni'ma kinima manino vu'nea knafina, maka Juda vahe'mo'zane Israeli vahe'mo'zanena ha'ma hu avu'ava zana omnege'za knare hu'za mani'naze. Hagi Dani mopareti'ma vuno, sauti kaziga Beseba kumate'ma uhanati'neana, wainine fiki zafaramina mago mago nagamofona metere hige'za ana zafamofo tonapi manitere hu'naze.
